thread.section_title: Baby-Garage Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Baby-Garage | baby-garage.de | 2 von 61
thread.title: Sunna G. Herrmann
thread.title_full: Baby-Garage bewertet von Sunna G. Herrmann

author: Sunna G. Herrmann
title: Sunna G. Herrmann
text:
Ordered a complete cybex priam stroller with additional accessories, the best prices I could find.
Stroller parasol was delayed from producer, but on inquiry babygarage sent me all the other stuff prior and the parasol later, at no additional cost for me.
The fabric for the carrycot was unfortunately faulty upon reciept (the inner zipper was broken).
I wrote to babygarage about the issue with pictures on the 23rd of september, but did not get an answer until I pushed for it 5 days later.
I was then informed that my inquiry had been received and passed forward to cybex, and that I would get a new cover for the carrycot, and that I could use the damaged one until I would recieve the new one.
But then 2 weeks later I received an email from babygarage saying that cybex did not accept the fault - I should fix the zipper my self - but if I could send more pictures they would push cybex again.
In the end the issue was resolved and I got a new cover for the stroller.
But it took 3 weeks for that to be resolved - lucky for me I was very timely with my order, so my baby had not arrived yet - I would not have been pleased if I needed to use the stroller and the matter taking so long to fix.
Babygarage should have sent a carrycot cover straight away and then discuss the issue with cybex and leave me out of it.
With that being said, costumer service were always very nice to talk to (I only e-mailed), although they could have been more informative (in the 5 days + 2 weeks that went by when I heard nothing).
Everything else about the stroller and accessories are perfect <3
I would definitly shop there again and have already recommended the site to others.
